title: The holocaust Ghetto Theresienstadt The truht behind the Nazi de
description:
The holocaust
Ghetto Theresienstadt
The truth behind the Nazi deception
1941-1945


Warning
This historical documentary contains scenes of a violent and disturbing nature


Between 1941 and 1945 the small fortress town of Theresienstadt in Czechoslovakia became a transit point to the death camps in the east for thousands of Czech, German, Austrian and Dutch Jews.

All those deported to Theresienstadt were led to believe it was an ÃƒÂ¢??end campÃƒÂ¢?? from which they would travel no further. They were promised a comfortable and peaceful life in the "Reich home for the aged" and were hoodwinked into signing over to the S.S. all of their properties and assets. In reality, many would be sent on to death camps such as Auschwitz.

From 1943, following international concern, the Nazis developed Theresienstadt into a "show camp" a propaganda exercise designed to conceal from the outside world what was really happening to EuropeÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â´s Jews. A large scale "beautification" programme swung into action, giving the camp a pleasant and respectable facade, a deception that succeeded in shielding  the terrible truth.
